name: Mulled Wine
description: Greet winter guests with the most welcoming hot drink of the season.
preparation: Gently simmer wine and Mulling Spices in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup over medium heat for a minimum 15 minutes.
Strain and return to the pot. Stir in brandy and simmer covered for 5 minutes.
Sweeten to taste. Serve garnished with cinnamon sticks and orange and lemon slices, if desired.
tips: For a Mulled Cider, replace wine in recipe above with 4 cups apple, pomegranate, or cranberry juice.
